name: Superhero Speed Date
description:
Superhero Speed Date is  a point-and-click adventure game about finding romance within the superhero community!

Play as an intrepid reporter on an undercover mission to get the hottest scoop of the century - the secrets of Super Victory League! Chat up all the extra ordinary guests attending the annual Speed Date For Charity. Form bonds with people who are literally out of this world. Play your cards right and you could be going home with more than just a hot new story.

Made in Adventure Game Studios at New York University.

Credits:

Gabriella Barros

Mary Kenney

Morgan Macri

Taylor Cyr

Mostafa Haque
